Transfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice This emits when the approved address for an item is changed or
  reaffirmed. The zero address indicates there is no approved address.
  When a Transfer event emits, this also indicates that the approved
  address for that item (if any) is reset to none.
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation:
@notice This emits when an operator is enabled or disabled for an owner.
  The operator can manage all items of the owner.
nodes.name: ApprovalForAll

nodes.documentation: @dev this is the function called when upgrading items
nodes.name: upgradeItems

devdoc.author: HÃ¥vard Pedersen, B6056952

createItem(uint256,uint16,uint16,uint16,.details: Function to mint a new item, store it in the owners array and send out events.

params._img: the int that stores both item type and logic for what image to use.
params._owner: the address of the lucky owner of this newly minted item
params._rarity: the rarity of the new item
params._stat2: these two are the stats of the items, where they should be assigned to stat[] as follows: [_stat1, _stat2].

createItem(uint256,uint16,uint16,uint16,.return: returns the id of the new item

upgradeItems(address,uint256,uint256,uin.details: this is the function called when upgrading items

devdoc.title: ItemBase contract. Holds all types and events
